cs.eng1.piazzapanic.ui.UIStopwatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout
public class UIStopwatch extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Label
UIStopWatch is a label that can update itself to display time elapsed. This is used to display the game timer.
